name: Signal Decay Demo
description:
This demo is specifically created for IndieCade: Anywhere and Everywhere. You are invited to play the free demo of this nominated game! This demo only includes the co-op mode of the game.

https://anywhere.indiecade.com/nominated-games/signal-decay/

This demo requires DISCORD for networking!

Assemble a cyber agent team to infiltrate procedurally-generated bases in this co-op stealth roguelike adventure. Master highly tactical combat, a cache of cyber weaponry, and teamwork to save humanity from mind-control.
